bioconda.name: discovar
bioconda.summary: Suitable for variant calling with reference and de novo assembly of small genomes.

biocontainers.name: discovar
biocontainers.summary: Variant caller designed for state-of-the-art data. it can call variants on a region by region basis, potentially tiling an entire large genome. its variant calling is under active development and transitioning to vcf.

biotools.summary: Variant caller designed for state-of-the-art data. It can call variants on a region by region basis, potentially tiling an entire large genome. Its variant calling is under active development and transitioning to VCF.

bioschemas.name: DISCOVAR
bioschemas.summary: Variant caller designed for state-of-the-art data. It can call variants on a region by region basis, potentially tiling an entire large genome. Its variant calling is under active development and transitioning to VCF.
